extendedInfo.description: This app provides checklists for collecting all the greatest treasures and items around Hyrule. You can mark off items as completed so you always know what you still have left to find!This app includes - Heart Piece Locations - Golden Skulltula Locations - Item Upgrades - Biggoron Sword Side Quest - Soil Locations - Big Poe Locations - Happy Mask Shop Side Quest

reviews.title: Great to keep track with...
reviews.comment: But it could be more helpfull in finding everything...like put a screenshot of the map showing where the item is, but I have no complaints
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wooh
reviews.comment: Im loving it. I just think there should be a list of the songs you need to get... Would make my life soo much easier
reviews.author: Emilie Richardson

reviews.title: Great....
reviews.comment: Very helpful if ur new at the game! Would be 5* if u could add pictures to give the user an easier time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay
reviews.comment: Its accurate!!  And I need to know how to use my hookshot to get on the roof of the place with the cow in it and the heart piece in kokouriko
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Master Quest???
reviews.comment: Love it, but would love it even more if there was Master Quest item locations as well!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: The only thing I\'d like to see is an option that asks you to confirm, because if I accidentally check a gold skulltula, I have to go back to all of them to see which ones I actually got. Also, master quest (n64 and the mirrored version for 3ds) would be cool. Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice can yall do me 2  favors can put all the great fairy spots and can   yall do one for majoras mask plz\tSweet very easy to use and  saves ur progress
reviews.author: catherine hoffman

reviews.title: How about requirements?
reviews.comment: This app is awesome but could you add in requirements for each heart piece or gold skulltula? For example, if you need to be an adult and have the hookshot to get a heart piece, it would be very helpful to know that before you spend the time trying to get it as a child.  If that bit of information could be included this app would be perfect and I could abandon my trusty spreadsheets! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!!!
reviews.comment: Im going for a perfect game (on my 3ds) and I have a printed checklist that I hate having to lug around. Now I have it on my phone. Best app ever!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Majoras mask?
reviews.comment: Is there one of these for majoras mask? I\'d love to install it!
reviews.author: Valerie Orr

reviews.title: Very helpful, but a minor typo
reviews.comment: This is a great checklist, but I noticed one typo. In the \"item upgrade\" section, it says \"collect the fire, water, and ice arrow.\" There is no water arrow: instead it should say \"collect the fire, LIGHT, and ice arrow.\"
reviews.author: Nicholas Jabbour

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Too bad it doesn\'t have secret grottos. Game doesn\'t keep track of that at all, so an app for it would be really helpful.
reviews.author: Steven Norwalt

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Works perfectly.  Thank you for the memories!  Would be nice if you added Great Fairy locations.
reviews.author: Cindy Bateman

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Just what I needed! Quicker than looking on the internet for them
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Plz can u add master quest heart pieces location and golden skultulas location too that would be good as im stuck on master quest
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Perfect, do you have mm in the works?
reviews.author: Hollee Carter

reviews.title: Best Zelda Helper
reviews.comment: Only thing that should be added is a Master Quest helper. Some things are changed, especially Skulltula locations. Will get 5 stars if Master Quest is added.
reviews.author: Shelby Lynne Bush

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: However, there is no progress bar that I can see in the what\'s new section it talks about. Other than that, great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: So helpful, easy to use. A perfect companion when playing OOT!
reviews.author: Mary McGowan

reviews.comment: Great app! Two suggestions: Please add Great Fairy locations, and also (if possible) do one for Master Quest! =)
reviews.author: A Google User
